name: The Earth Is Flat
description:
Stop the spread of missinformation by throwing books at missinformed citizens (red) which makes them informed (black). 

You win by informing all missinformed citizens and you lose if everyone becomes missinformed or you become missinformed. 

Missinformation is spread to those who are close to and followed by someone who is missinformed. Missinformed people will follow a random informed person until that person becomes missinformed or the missinformed person becomes informed.

There are 5 levels. Can you complete them all?

CONTROLS

W,A,S,D = Walk

R = Reset

Space = Throw book

Move Mouse = Aim

TIP: The books move slowly. You can use this to your advantage by throwing the books down passages that the enemies will pass through later, allowing you to move to another location before the enemies arrive. The books also stop if they hit a wall.
